methodology.title: Our Methodology
methodology.subtitle: How we rank AI coding tools
methodology.sections.scoringFactors.intr: Our algorithm evaluates tools across 8 key dimensions, each weighted according to its importance to developers:
methodology.sections.modifiers.title: Dynamic Modifiers
methodology.sections.modifiers.intro: To ensure rankings reflect current market realities, we apply three sophisticated modifiers:
methodology.sections.dataCollection.intr: We gather data from multiple sources to ensure accuracy:
methodology.sections.dataCollection.sour: Direct API integrations with tool providers
Industry reports and verified news sources
methodology.sections.updateFrequency.con: Rankings are recalculated weekly to reflect the rapidly evolving AI landscape. Major methodology updates are versioned and documented.
about.subtitle: Empowering developers with data-driven AI tool insights
about.hero.title: Empowering developers with data-driven AI tool insights
about.hero.subtitle: We believe developers deserve transparent, objective rankings of AI coding tools to make informed decisions.
about.mission.content: To provide the developer community with the most comprehensive, unbiased, and up-to-date rankings of AI coding tools, helping teams choose the right tools for their needs.
about.whyWeBuiltThis.title: Why We Built This
about.whyWeBuiltThis.reasons.0: The AI tools landscape is evolving rapidly, making it hard to keep track
about.whyWeBuiltThis.reasons.1: Marketing claims often don't match real-world performance
about.whyWeBuiltThis.reasons.2: Developers need objective data to justify tool adoption
about.whyWeBuiltThis.reasons.3: There was no single source comparing all major AI coding tools
about.newsletter.title: Stay Updated
about.newsletter.description: Get weekly insights on AI tool rankings and industry trends.

about.whyItMatters.description: In the rapidly evolving AI landscape, developers need reliable data to make informed decisions.
about.whyItMatters.points.3: Choose tools that fit your needs
